subject: Re: FW: Grant Section 3.1 Editorial Policy and 3.2 Complaints Handling Policy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Scott, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://unearth-ed.com.au/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
I'm also going to send through a different introduction to the magazine again for the purposes of the grant

Looks great mate, can you please change it to be called a magazine, for the purposes of the grant.

Thanks Heath

Hi Scott, 

Thanks for the MailChimp hint, we were looking on the website for the file. 

Confirming we have now added the brochure to the home page, available for download: 
https://unearth-ed.com.au/
@rica now I know what Scott is referring to. I'm on it : )

Heath, we sent it out via Mailchimp last October which was a link back to the website so that concerns as to why it isn't on the site; did we send it out to a link to the 2019 edition ( I don't think we did); can you see you have that first because that will be the finished product.

Hello Scott,

To proceed with your request, may I have the link or the file for the 2020 magazine?

We'll be waiting for your response.

Thanks mate, just need to I think get the 2020 magazine on the front page perhaps where the subscribe to the Newsletter, theres no link to the 2020 magazine that I can see, the old one comes.

It meeds to be in a profile spot.

Ill be using this URL in the tender.

Hope that makes sense

Kind regards, sl

Hi Scott, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.

Here are the links: 
https://unearth-ed.com.au/unearth-ed-publishing-editorial-policy/
https://unearth-ed.com.au/unearth-ed-publishing-complaints-policy/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@rica @heath 

Please check if ok now and I added also to the footer.

https://unearth-ed.com.au/unearth-ed-publishing-editorial-policy/
https://unearth-ed.com.au/unearth-ed-publishing-complaints-policy/

Manuel M

@rica please check while waiting for the instruction.

https://unearth-ed.com.au/?p=2400&preview=true
https://unearth-ed.com.au/?p=2399&preview=true

I need the featured images also.
Thanks.
@manuel  please add the attached file to the website and the client can not find the link to 2020 magazine, kindly check. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hey mate

Hope you’re well.

Could you please put these up on our website mate and a link to the 2020 magazine, I couldn’t see it on the site, going for a grant to enhance the magazine to make it better and assist with advertising revenue decline.

Martin likes the direction of the website where to now.

Kind regards, sl

From: Lesley Mannion <office@crowtherscoaches.com.au <mailto:office@crowtherscoaches.com.au>>
Sent: Sunday, 17 May 2020 11:01 AM
To: Marketing @ Unearth-ed <marketing@unearth-ed.com.au <mailto:marketing@unearth-ed.com.au>>
Subject: Grant Section 3.1 Editorial Policy and 3.2 Complaints Handling Policy

Hi Scott

Please find attached in word documents the policies required for the application that I was to work on.

Two things – I don’t really know what I am talking about and please read it to check that I reference the correct business names/emails etc that dove tail with your stuff.
Also please especially check them as they are going to be accessible on our website (I figured you needed them quick to get them to Heath asap).

I still need to do 3.3 – which is the 200 words to explain aspects of the above.

Also 1.5 Part A –chart of the corporate structure and Part B 1.1 Incorporated ACN and 2.1 ABN/GST registration (after talking to Peter and Paul)

Kind Regards
Lesley Mannion
